name: Driftwood Pirates
description:
Driftwood Pirates is a 2D colorful cutthroat adventure for pirates of all ages! Pick ye best buccaneer and hit the seas in this 10 Level adventure! An unforgettable journey for the treasure of a lifetime!

Join the crew of The Unicornus as they set sail for a legendary treasure... that may or may not exist! But be wary... the perilous Architects Of Fear stand between you and the X marked on your map! It'll take all of ye piratey skills to complete this adventure!

                                                               Friendship is the true strength!

Features:

  • Pick Ye Pirate - Choose from 4 colorful cutthroats. Each with their own unique backstory.
  • Upgrade Ye Ship - Strengthen ye sea vessel and become the most fearsome pirate on the waters!
  • Hire A Crew - Choose ye favorite Buccaneers-4-Hire to join ye on ye quest!
  • Explore Islands - What shall ye find on tharr island?
  • Gather Resources - Cut trees, mine stone, dig for treasure!
  • Engage In Ship Battles - Shoot, Repair, Aim! 
  • Battle Perilous Bosses - Can ye defeat them all?
  • Sail The Seas - 10 Unique levels for ye to explore!
  • Shanties Ahoy! - Driftwood Pirates features catchy sea dog tunes!
  • Unforgettable Characters - A cast of colorful cutthroats ye surely won't forget!
  • Minigames - Play some piratey minigames!
                                                Adventure Never Dies!

(Online Mode and Arcade Mode are still in development. Support and follow the project if you wish to see these features added)
